frontmatter.title: Timeseries add-on lost a lot of weight
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: We've updated most visualizations in the Timeseries add-on
frontmatter.longExcerpt: Timeseries' visualizations are becoming fully PyQt, making them easier to maintain. We've also fixed many bugs, which should make working with the timeseries a joy once again.
